page.title: 13E.ALLINGTON PARISH CHURCH
page.content: The Parish Church of St.Andrew was complete by the fourteenth century,and the high altar was dedicated in thirteen thirty three.Every Sunday it is still used for the Eucharist during which the sixteenth century pulpit is used for the sermon.Sometimes children are also baptised at the nineteenth century font.Every one is always welcome.The church is open every day for people to come into and pray. Wedding's, burial services and confirmations take place on weekdays. Many local people give help like the churchwardens,organist,bell-ringers, choir,servers,sidesperson,readers, magazine distributors,flower arranger, churchyard-caretaker,cleaners, councillors,and Sunday school teachers.Adults and children help the church here and overseas and raise funds.
